Shockwave/Manterror/Injector/Counter Punch:


Shockwave, going through the at over Mach 2, chuckled as he heard gunfire.  
He wasn't worried about bullets hitting him.  He was faster than a bullet!  
Continuing on course, he headed for Antarctica.

======

Injector got up slowly, being rocketed into a tree from Triceradon's grenade.

Manterror went flying backwards, landing on his back from a grenade.

Counter Punch, finally approaching the Predacon base, saw the small battle.  
Sneaking up behind Triceradon, raising his rocket launcher and firing  a 
missile at the middle of the Maximal's back.
